titleStmt.title: A discourse of the knowledg of beasts, wherein all that hath been said for, and against their ratiocination, is examined. / By Monsieur de la Chambre, counsellor to the King of France in his counsels, and his physitian in ordinary. Translated into English by a person of quality.
Traité de la connoissance des animaux. English
titleStmt.author: La Chambre, Marin Cureau de, 1594-1669.
Person of quality.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Newcomb for Humphrey Moseley at the Princes Arms in St. Pauls Church-Yard.,

notesStmt.note: A translation of his "Traité de la connoissance des animaux", which is a reply to "De l'instinct et de la connoissance des animaux" by Pierre Chanet.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Nouemb:"; The '7' in imprint date is altered to an "8".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
